title: B. Riley Estimates Bitcoin Depot FY2024 Earnings
description: Bitcoin Depot Inc. (NASDAQ:BTM – Free Report) – Investment analysts at B. Riley issued their FY2024 earnings per share estimates for shares of Bitcoin Depot in a research report issued on Wednesday, January 22nd. B. Riley analyst H. Goetsch forecasts that the company will post earnings of $0.13 per share for the year. The consensus […]

title: **AgriFORCE Growing Systems Completes Acquisition of Bitcoin Mining Facility in Ohio and Appoints New COO** **
description: ** AgriFORCE Growing Systems, Ltd. (NASDAQ: AGRI) announced the acquisition of assets for a five-megawatt Bitcoin mining facility in Columbiana County, Ohio, on January 17, 2025. The purchase, including an option to buy the facility, amounted to $4.55 million. Among the assets acquired were 900 S-19 J Pro BITMAIN Antminers and other necessary equipment like […]

title: Upexi Shifts Focus to Cryptocurrency with Strategic Investment in Digital Currency
description: Upexi, Inc. (NASDAQ: UPXI) announced its strategic shift towards cryptocurrency with the establishment of a digital currency holding company. The move aims to invest in and capitalize on opportunities within the cryptocurrency space, including Bitcoin and other high-growth potential coins. With an initial investment in Bitcoin, Upexi is actively exploring more investment opportunities to expand […]
